pullrequest.title: Replace joint frame references with Jc and Jp

content.raw:
Agh… I have such a hard time with comments in bitbucket!

ok, enough of me complaining. Look at what I found in my laptop!: [https://gist.github.com/amcastro-tri/bc9aabb90a44e21e60773527b06fdea5](https://gist.github.com/amcastro-tri/bc9aabb90a44e21e60773527b06fdea5)  
  
 I had put this together some time  in the past precisely to explain frames in Drake, but it still din’t make it in a PR. If you like it, please use it in this PR!
content.html:
Agh… I have such a hard time with comments in bitbucket!

ok, enough of me complaining. Look at what I found in my laptop!: https://gist.github.com/amcastro-tri/bc9aabb90a44e21e60773527b06fdea5

I had put this together some time in the past precisely to explain frames in Drake, but it still din’t make it in a PR. If you like it, please use it in this PR!
